Package game_objects.actions

Class UseItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • game_objects.actions.Action
      • game_objects.actions.UseItem
  • public class UseItem
extends Action
    This class represents the UseItem action. It does not perform an action itself, but creates all useitem actions for all items in player's inventory

      this action has no event
